EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.London Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow! Please see event details below and feel free to contact us at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Wednesday, May 31, 2017 {{my.London:default=edit me}}
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: Pivotal 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
For more in-depth reading on cloud-native, please visit our dedicated topic page on cloud-native applications <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
Directions Scaffolding obscures sight lines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Exit Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you is an advertisement with "Ceviche" and "Maki"; walk past the sign towards a mini courtyard to the right - Our building's revolving doors are on your left - Enter the building, walk down past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
